Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SinglePlayerGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SinglePlayerGame
public class SinglePlayerGame
extends Game
This class is used for solo-mode and it's the intermediary between all the game's components.

  • Method Details

    • updateFaithTrack

      public java.lang.Boolean updateFaithTrack​(int position)
      Updates the faith track if the player has earned faith points. If it's true delivers faith zone victory points, else if it's the last pope space player gain extra VP according to their final position.
      Parameters:
      position - position reached by the player.
      Returns:
      returns true if it's on the last pope space otherwise returns false.

    • updateFaithTrack

      public boolean updateFaithTrack()
      It updates the FaithTrack and checks if a player passed a FaithZone.
      Overrides:
      updateFaithTrack in class Game
      Returns:
      true if a FaithZone has been activated.

      Moves the player on the faith track.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
